title: Blitz Grab
body: Is this Normal guys???

replies.body: Instead of HTML (which Boards only minimally supports for unprivileged posters), simply paste the direct link to the image (not its Imgur wrapper page). You might need to append "[]" or "[/img]" after each URL for it to render properly.

Its hard to tell but the corner of the hitbox on his grab just BARELY missed the first minion. On its way to the second minion it hit your leg hitbox first. This checks out as a extreme case of bad luck.
